name: odd
title: :odd Selector
desc: Selects odd elements, zero-indexed. See also even.

examples.desc: Finds odd table rows, matching the second, fourth and so on (index 1, 3, 5 etc.).
examples.html:
Row with Index #0
Row with Index #1
Row with Index #2
Row with Index #3

entries.longdesc: In particular, note that the 0-based indexing means that, counter-intuitively, :odd selects the second element, fourth element, and so on within the matched set.
